lst.name: sentence
lst.str: However, there has been considerable resistance to the package, partly because of some of the clauses it contains and partly because many small U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: After months of haggling, a proposed rescheduling agreement for Mexico was struck last September during the annual meeting of the World Bank and International Monetary Fund in Washington.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Other bankers, who declined to be identified, said other groups of banks particularly those in Switzerland, France and Canada, were equally reluctant to sign, although they had not sent any telex to Citibank, which chairs Mexico's 13-bank advisory group.
